content: in next st then *skip next st single_crochet in next st skip next st 4 double_crochet in next st *14 times next join with slip st to top of first single_crochet cut yarn total of 15 shells of 4 double_crochet weave in all loose ends notes 1 when instructed to cut yarn be sure to leave a 5 or 6 inch tail in order to have enough yarn to weave in loose ends securely 2 this may be made in one color or several depending on your choice the average total amount of yarn i have used for this project is 0 7 ounces when using peaches and crème worsted weight yarn 3 i use the magic_ring because of all the ways i know how to start a circle it works best for me please be advised that this pattern is copyrighted to norma r wampler and june-2010 all rights reserved you may print out a copy for personal and charitable use only pattern may not be shared via email or posted on websites blogs or given to groups without written permission from norma r wampler you may reach me through ravelry id scrunchyy or through comments at http //stitchingandliving net
